lastTaskCompleted.title: All 5 critical audit bugs fixed and deployed (39/39 tests passing)
lastTaskCompleted.summary: P1: Top-N dedup (GROUP BY). P2: Sharpe min 30 trades. P3: Temporal split 24h embargo. P4: Health labels corrected. P5: Convergence gates + auto-archive. All live on :8888. Dashboard includes new backtest-vs-paper section.

recentlyCompleted.title: All 5 critical audit bugs fixed and validated (39/39 tests passing)
recentlyCompleted.summary: P1: Top-N deduplication (GROUP BY model_name). P2: Sharpe min 30 trades. P3: Data leakage (temporal split, no shuffle). P4: Health score labels fixed (15=CRITICAL). P5: Convergence gates + auto-archive.

recentlyCompleted.title: Fixed: Claude-aware rate limiting (1000 RPM)
recentlyCompleted.summary: Added ClaudeRateLimiter to llm_client.py tracking requests per 1-min sliding window. Exponential backoff at 950 RPM threshold. Prevents 429 errors from aggressive optimization loops.

recentlyCompleted.title: Blofin trading pipeline fully operational with real data

deploymentLog.action: Evening deployment: strategy pruning + parameter tuning + VWAP threshold fix
changes: ✅ Fixed Claude rate limiter (1000 RPM per-minute sliding window)
⏳ Disabling 3 loser strategies (breakout 25.1% WR, momentum 30.9%, reversal 34.8%)
⏳ Parameter tuning: bb_squeeze +min_band_width, momentum threshold +0.4%, RSI SELL gate
📝 Momentum flagged for 24h re-enable review (conflict with paper trading +0.05% pnl)
